Author: AtmoOmen
Name: Currency Tracker
Description:
Aimed to help you track changes of various in-game currencies transactions (Gil, Seal, Tomestone, etc.).
Also provides features for queries, graphs, exporting data, and custom currencies tracker.
Changelog:
- Functional Adjustments:
  - Adjusted the transactions data reading logicï¼Œwhich should bring obivious performance improvement.
  - Adjusted the presentation logic of Custom Tracker, which now apply paging method to display items.
  - Added a new functions under Transactions Toolbar: Merge, which allow you to merge any selected transactions.
  - Adjusted the operation logic of mutilple selection when holding Ctrl.
- UI Adjustments:
  - Adjusted 0 Change text color when enable Change Text Coloring.
- Others:
  - Adjusted some appropiate expressions in English localization.
